creator: aterrestris@gmail.com
text:
Documentation for the Basic Authenticator Valve is wrong, it mentions several attributes for the Digest Authenticator Valve which of course don't and won't exist for this valve.
For example, the nonce related attributes are out of meaning.

Thanks. Looks like a copy/paste error that only affects 6.0.x.

Fixed in 6.0.x for 6.0.44 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
